snippet: Core consumer inflation rose 1.3 percent in December from a year earlier, the fastest pace in five years.
abstract: Data shows that rate of core consumer inflation in Japan rose at fastest pace in more than five years in Dec 2013 and job market improved, encouraging signs for country’s central bank as it seeks to vanquish deflation with aggressive money printing.
lead_paragraph: Core consumer inflation rose 1.3 percent in December from a year earlier, the fastest pace in five years.

headline.main: Encouraging Signs in Japan’s Drive Against Deflation
